H0.text: John Lennon's hand-written lyrics for which song sold for US$1.2 million at Sotheby's in June 2010. Yesterday

H1.text: John Lennon's hand-written lyrics for which song sold for US$1.2 million at Sotheby's in June 2010. Hey Jude

H2.text: John Lennon's hand-written lyrics for which song sold for US$1.2 million at Sotheby's in June 2010. Strawberry Fields Forever

H3.text: John Lennon's hand-written lyrics for which song sold for US$1.2 million at Sotheby's in June 2010. A day in life

A4.text: The lyric sheet was auctioned again by Sotheby's in June 2010 and was purchased by an anonymous American buyer who paid $1,200,000 (Â£810,000).

A5.text: In 2004, Rolling Stone ranked it at number 28 on the magazine's list of 'The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time', number 28 on a revised list in 2011, number 24 on a revised list on 2021, and in 2010, deemed it to be the Beatles' greatest song.
